images.caption:
The locality is situated in a high spruce forest under the horizon in the left part of the picture
Photo by P. Rozsíval

Bodies of quarzites crop out under the locality – collecting locality Weissenstein
Photo by P. Rozsíval

Granátovka locality, there are rocks in brash and positions of schist with almandine crystals up to 30 mm in the outcrops (so-called old collections)
Photo by P. Rozsíval

View of collectors’ diggings, there are quartzite rocks visible in the brash
Photo by P. Rozsíval

Schist fragments are smaller – collectors endeavoured to find samples with almandine
Photo by P. Novotný

Schist with almandine crystals up to 18 mm, Granátovka
Photo by P. Rozsíval

Rutile crystal up to 13 mm in a quartz vein occurring in quartzites of the Weissenstein locality
Photo by J. Král
